Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1; rv:2.0b13pre) Gecko/20110226 Thunderbird/3.3a3pre

Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; de; rv:1.9.2.13) Gecko/20101207 Mnenhy/0.8.1 Thunderbird/3.1.7 ThunderBrowse/3.3.5

If you move the top-level message of a thread where the first child messages has a grandchild/child itself, the second level messages becomes the top one, but there are artifacts for showing the threading tree structure.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Reply to an existing message, choose send later.
2. Reply to the message from 1. and choose to send later.
3. Reply to the message from 2. and choose to send later.
4. Move these messages to the one you replied to in 1. and enable threading.
5. Drag and drop the message from 1 to another folder.

Actual result:
Artifact of threading tree shown (works as expected for pressing the 'delete' key).

Expected result:
No artifact
